text: Hey guys, a question, using graphql together with a module in react, how can I pass parameters to the query to control what it returns? Suppose I want to manipulate the calls by applying different filters.

<https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-js-building-block-examples/blob/0ea279d08f22d2fef0725736a89dc26c5c9f9a41/contact-profile/contact-profile-project/contact-profile-app/components/modules/ContactWithAssociations/index.jsx#L76-L78|https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-js-building-block-examples/blob/0ea279d08f22d2fef07[…]rofile-app/components/modules/ContactWithAssociations/index.jsx> I think this is the pattern you’re looking for - using a hubl comment similar to query parameters in hubl modules
Oh thanks Ben, I’ll try this
